messages.message:
I'm experiencing errors on sandbox (https://instabase.sandboxes.site/sandboxes/tonybackend3?cw=dev) building core-platform-service (among others). Seems like an auth issue (status code 401). Has anyone found a solution to this yet?

@tony.shi I just logged in to your sandbox and it's working now -- did you figure out a fix?
